channel.title: personal on Mike Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Mike Johnson

item.title: CV
item.description: Curriculum Vitae - Mike Johnson Summary Experienced DevOps engineer and Linux system administrator with cloud experience on GCP. I have a particular interest in High Performance Computing for researchers and engineers. Free software proponent. Professional experience May 2014 to Nov 2019: SRE - Systems Engineer (ex. DevOps, ex SA) - DeepMind, Google Health UK I designed, built, developed, and maintained the infrastructure and platform for DeepMind Health - built on Linux, running Docker and Kubernetes, and isolated from the Google production network.

item.title: What I Use
item.description: Inspired by (copied from) several others, I thought I’d have a go at putting some notes together on what I use day-to-day. Ali Spittel Wes Bos Jessica Dembe Ben Hong This was inspired by a Twitter thread started by Sarah Drasner that I spotted in July 2019. I’m not a software engineer, and I never have been. My current job title is ‘Systems Engineer, Site Reliability Engineer’, but most of my career has been spent answering to ‘System Administrator’.

item.title: Me
item.description: Hi. My name is Mike Johnson. I work for Google.
